name: BOYSEN®® Gloss Lacquer Enamel White B‑1200

info.title: DESCRIPTION
info.body: BOYSEN®® Gloss Lacquer Enamel White B‑1200 is a high-grade, pigmented lacquer topcoat. It is highly recommended for industrial, residential & commercial usage and for product finishing.

info.title: PRINCIPAL USES
info.body: It is a durable finish for wooden and metal surfaces not directly exposed to weathering.

info.title: SURFACE PREPARATION
info.subtitle: Wooden Surfaces
info.body: Surface to be painted should be clean and dry, free from dust, dirt, and other foreign matter. Hammer all nails deep enough to apply putty. Sand rough wood until smooth and then dust off before painting.

info.title: SURFACE PREPARATION
info.subtitle: Metal Surfaces
info.body: Wipe with a rag soaked in paint thinner to remove grease, oil, wax, and other foreign matter. For new galvanized surfaces, etch the surface by applying 10% BOYSEN®® Metal Etching Solution B‑71 (Dilute 1 part of B‑71 to 9 parts water). Rinse with water and dry immediately. Unpainted galvanized surfaces that have been exposed for 6 months or more need not be etched. Treat rusted steel by sanding and wire brushing. Use BOYSEN®® Metal Etching Solution B‑71 on remaining rust. Let it stay for 10-15 minutes. Be sure to remove all remaining residue. Immediately prime after drying.

info.title: SURFACE PREPARATION
info.subtitle: Repainting
info.body: Scrape off all loose, scaling, flaking, and peeling paint manually or by using BOYSEN®® Paint and Varnish Remover B‑141, as necessary. Wash surfaces clean and completely remove chemical residue. Let it dry. For repainting other surfaces such as wood, apply the appropriate primer before recoating.

info.title: PAINTING SCHEDULE
info.subtitle: Wooden Surfaces
info.body: 1st coat: BOYSEN®® Lacquer Primer Surfacer B‑305 2nd coat: BOYSEN®® Lacquer Spot Putty B‑306 3rd coat: BOYSEN®® Lacquer Primer Surfacer B‑305 Final coat: BOYSEN®® Gloss Lacquer Enamel White B‑1200 (in required coats)

info.title: PAINTING SCHEDULE
info.subtitle: Metal Surfaces
info.body: Primer: BOYSEN®® Epoxy Primer 2nd & 3rd coat: BOYSEN®® Gloss Lacquer Enamel White B‑1200 (in required coats)
